attributes.action: Introduce Legislation to Prevent Convicted Sex Offenders Serving As MP
attributes.additional_details:
In a 2021 parliamentary by-election a convicted sex offender stood for election. There is currently no legislation that prevents a convicted sex offedner running for or serving as a member of parliament. Furthermore, these is no legislation leading to the automatic disqualification of MPs who have been convicted of a sex offence.
 
This petition proposes preventing all sex offenders acting in the capacity of public office.
attributes.background: This petition proposes the introduction of legislation that would mean automatic disqualification of any MP convicted of any sex offence under the Sexual Offences Act 2003.
